description: This HTML file defines the frontend interface for a Database Viewer application. It includes markup, styles, and client-side scripts to browse, select, and display database tables and their data, with features like refresh, expandable cells, and responsive layout.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Dynamically generates HTML for displaying table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells, supporting expandable content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell contents for long or object data.
